title: Super League Gaming CEO on Esports & the Metaverse
itunes:title: Super League Gaming CEO on Esports & the Metaverse
description:
Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu, and Mike Lynch catch up with Super League Gaming Chairman & CEO Ann Hand. They discuss the burgeoning metaverse market and the powerful opportunities for commerce, digital fashion products, the what the future holds for esports.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
